## listColumnDefinitions() function

Create a set of ColumnDefs by enumerating the table. Optional set of column names indicating they are read-only (i.e., not deletable in UI) TODO: this should reside in the webapp

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function listColumnDefinitions(table: ColumnTable, readOnlyNames?: Set<string>): ColumnDefinition[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable | table to start with |
|  readOnlyNames | Set&lt;string&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> list of columns to flag as read only |

<b>Returns:</b>

ColumnDefinition\[\]
